line.comment: * No point doing this unless we are undocked
* Delay for under a second, but poll for changes in the command 100 ms intervals.
* We need to make sure this doesn't get stuck here.
* Every little bit check to see if we need to target debris and also look for new roids
* If our can hold status changes, then alert player cargo bay full.
* Auto collect using transporter device and ore collector

sval.val: No point doing this unless we are undocked
Delay for under a second, but poll for changes in the command 100 ms intervals.
We need to make sure this doesn't get stuck here.
Every little bit check to see if we need to target debris and also look for new roids
If our can hold status changes, then alert player cargo bay full.
Auto collect using transporter device and ore collector
